titles.title: HAMLET Act
HAMLET Act
Housing And Medicaid Legislation for Expansion Targets Act
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to prohibit estate recovery from certain expansion individuals under the Medicaid program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Housing And Medicaid Legislation for Expansion Targets Act or the HAMLET Act
This bill prohibits state Medicaid programs from using estate recovery to recoup the costs of benefits provided to individuals in the Medicaid expansion population.
